transparency_law.name: Maine Freedom of Access Act
transparency_law.statute_citation: Maine Revised Statutes Title 1, Chapter 13 § 401 et seq.

response_requirements.initial_response_description: Agency must acknowledge receipt within 5 working days and provide good faith estimate of timeframe and costs. Must make good faith effort to respond within estimated time. 'Reasonable time' standard - no fixed deadline.
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: If denied, must receive written notice within 5 working days. Appeal to Superior Court within 30 days of denial.

fee_structure.electronic_fee: No per-page fee for electronic records
fee_structure.search_time_fee: First 2 hours free. After 2 hours: Up to $25/hour for search/retrieval
fee_structure.notes: First 2 hours of staff time are free. Maximum 10¢ per page for copying. No per-page fee for electronic records. Up to $25/hour after 2 hours.

exemptions.description: Personnel records and employee evaluations (over 300 statutory exemptions exist throughout Maine law)
Trade secrets and proprietary business information

appeal_process.appeal_description: Appeals must be made within 30 days of denial to Superior Court in county where request was made. Attorney General may be involved in appeals.
appeal_process.court_jurisdiction: Superior Court in county where request was made

penalties.civil: Court may award attorney fees and costs to prevailing plaintiff

requester_requirements.specific_format: Every person has the right to inspect and copy any public record. Request should be specific and detailed.
requester_requirements.notes: No residency requirement. Any person may request.

specific_obligations: Provide good faith estimate of timeframe and costs
Make good faith effort to respond within estimated time
Provide written notice within 5 working days if denied, stating specific reason
Training required for public officials on FOAA requirements

oversight_body.name: Right to Know Advisory Committee
oversight_body.role: Advisory committee to assist with FOAA implementation and provide guidance

validation_metadata.verification_notes: Parsed from official statutory text file.
